name.en: Independent Study: The Encoding and Retrieval of Episodic Memory
name.ch: 獨立研究: 情節記憶的登錄與提取

department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: The aim of this course is to provide basic and up-dated knowledge about the cognitive operations and neural mechanisms underlying the encoding and retrieval of episodic memory.
goal.en: The aim of this course is to provide basic and up-dated knowledge about the cognitive operations and neural mechanisms underlying the encoding and retrieval of episodic memory.

outline.ch: “Basics of cognitive electrophysiology, theories of memory, and functional neuroimaging studies.“
outline.en: “Basics of cognitive electrophysiology, theories of memory, and functional neuroimaging studies.“

instructMethod.ch:
講授
研討
實習/實驗
個別指導

domain.ch:
基礎認知神經科學理論


、


認知實驗方法學


、


記憶與情緒
domain.en:
基礎認知神經科學理論


、

ch.competencies: 獨立設計與執行研究計畫
溝通、表達與團隊合作能力

en.competencies: Independently design and execute research projects
Proficiency and intergration of research tools in Cognitive Neuroscience

ch: 系所:限認知神經科學研究所碩士班、認知神經科學研究所博士班、跨領域神經科學博士學位學程(台灣聯合大學系統)、跨領域神經科學國際研究生博士學位學程。
en: Department:Graduate Institute of Cognitive Neuroscience、Graduate Institute of Cognitive Neuroscience、International Ph.D. program in Interdisciplinary neuroscience (University System of Taiwan)、International Ph.D. Program in Interdisciplinary Neuroscience only.
